results.title: Simvastatin Attenuates Neuropathic Pain by Inhibiting the RhoA/LIMK/Cofilin Pathway.
results.text_hl: Here, we found that @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly decreased the ratio of membrane/cytosolic @GENE_RHOA @GENE_117273 @@@RhoA@@@, which was significantly increased after @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Injury_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020208 @@@CCI@@@, by inhibiting the @GENE_RHOA @GENE_117273 @@@RhoA@@@/LIMK/cofilin pathway.

citations.NLM: Qiu Y, Chen WY, Wang ZY, Liu F, Wei M, Ma C, Huang YG. Simvastatin Attenuates Neuropathic Pain by Inhibiting the RhoA/LIMK/Cofilin Pathway. Neurochem Res. 2016 Sep;41(9):2457-69. PMID: 27216618
citations.BibTeX: @article{27216618, title={Simvastatin Attenuates Neuropathic Pain by Inhibiting the RhoA/LIMK/Cofilin Pathway.}, author={Qiu Y and Chen WY and Wang ZY and Liu F and Wei M and Ma C and Huang YG}, journal={Neurochem Res}, volume={41}, number={9}, pages={2457-69}}

results.title: Intensive perioperative simvastatin treatment protects from chronic kidney allograft injury.
results.text_hl: RESULTS: We found that donor and recipient @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ pretreatment combined with daily recipient treatment reduced graft @DISEASE_Inflammation @DISEASE_MESH:D007249 @@@inflammation@@@ and @<m>DISEASE_Brain_Injury_Chronic</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D020208 @@@chronic allograft injury@@@.

citations.NLM: Palin NK, Savikko J, Rintala JM, Koskinen PK. Intensive perioperative simvastatin treatment protects from chronic kidney allograft injury. Am J Nephrol. 2015;41(4-5):383-91. PMID: 26111494
citations.BibTeX: @article{26111494, title={Intensive perioperative simvastatin treatment protects from chronic kidney allograft injury.}, author={Palin NK and Savikko J and Rintala JM and Koskinen PK}, journal={Am J Nephrol}, volume={41}, number={4-5}, pages={383-91}}
